channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overgroun branches, 4th September
item.description:
On pavement from railway causing slippery surface on pavement it is from railway growing on your land so cut branches beck and return to railway that way the problem is solved
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pembroke Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement ramp needed, 4th September
item.description:
Somehow there is no pavement ramp for wheelchair users here. People are often forced to cross the roads which isn’t always safe. Please built a curb ramp here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tavistock Road, Shortlands, London

item.title: Fly tipping, 3rd September
item.description:
A white ford transit van with the registration CT19 EVR pulled up at 1945 and dumped two large sofas in the street which is blocking one of the parking bays. CCTV footage is available by email
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 71-73, County Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet
